Class Price

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • java.math.BigDecimal
        • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.datatypes.Price
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.math.BigDecimal>

    public class Price
extends java.math.BigDecimal
    An extension of BigDecimal to handle Prices
    See Also:
